effects: Physical damage (3.5x, ATK) to one enemy

Gain access to following skills:
	Demolish+1 (504650)
	Dragon Foot+1 (704270)

Gain 4 uses of the following skills for one turn:
	Demolish+1 (504650)
name: Demolish

desc_short.0: Damage one enemy, enable perfect balance for one turn, and enable demolish or dragon foot to be used once
desc_short.5: Daña a un enemigo, aprende Equilibrio exquisito durante un turno y puede usar Demolición o Talón de dragón una vez
